imdb.plot outline: We The Students is the nation's first interactive debate show. College debaters from top schools around the country participate in engaging interactive debates on today's most compelling issues. The show is streamed LIVE on the show's website and incorporates live comments and questions from an engaged online audience.
imdb.title: We the Students

production companies.name: School of Communication - University of Miami
